title: Pulu Data TheThingsNetwork v1.4
description: In this JSON object you will see the data for the Pulu project.

light.description: Object that has the value of the light sensor.

value.description: Has the value of the light sensor.

status.description: Has status codes of the light sensor. When there is 0 in the data it's representing no data send

temperature.description: Object that has the value of the temperature sensors.

value.description: Has the value of the air temperature sensor.

status.description: Has status codes of the air temperature sensor. When there is 0 in the data it's representing no data send
